Metadata: South-Central California Oil and Gas Project Newsletter for Fishermen and Offshore Operators (Volume 8, Nos. 1-12, January-​December 1991)
The University of California Sea Grant Cooperative Extension

Topics in this newsletter include: Fisheries updates, Oil and gas impacts, Platform information, biological and seafloor surveys, Exxon/marine terminal abandonment, local beach projects, commercial fish licenses, oil spill legislation and management, ocean salmon fisheries, seafood topics, Joint oil/fisheries committee meeting, safety gear reports, offshore installation, LMFIP updates, vessel safety, scientific instrumentation​, groundfish fishery regulations, sediment sampling/ROV work, and much more.
